document.id: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R17-047
document.heading: PUEBLO DE SAN ILDEFONSO COUNCIL RESOLUTION NO. SI-R17-047
Approving and Enacting Amended Articles of Organization and Amended Operating Agreement for San Ildefonso Services, LLC
document.preamble: At a duly called meeting of the Council of San Ildefonso Pueblo on the 28th day of December, 2017, the following Resolution was adopted:

container.heading: Approving and Enacting Amended Articles of Organization and Amended Operating Agreement for San Ildefonso Services, LLC
container.annotation: See San Ildefonso Servs. Fourth Amended Arts. of Org.

annotation.doc: Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council Res. No. SI-R17-047

recital.text: the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo") is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America; and

para.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Pueblo') is a sovereign and self-governing Tribe, recognized as such by the United States of America.

recital.text: the sovereign authority of the Pueblo is vested in its Council and Governor; and

para.text: The sovereign authority of the Pueblo is vested in its Council and Governor.

recital.text: San Ildefonso Services, LLC, is chartered under tribal law as a single member limited liability company wholly owned by the Pueblo, and the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Governor and Council currently serve as the Member's Representatives; and

para.text: San Ildefonso Services, LLC, is chartered under tribal law as a single member limited liability company wholly owned by the Pueblo, and the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Governor and Council currently serve as the Member's Representatives.

recital.text: the Council has determined it is prudent and in the best interests of the Pueblo and San Ildefonso Services, LLC to reorganize the Member's Representatives and the Management of San Ildefonso Services, LLC to allow for more efficient oversight and management of the entity; and

para.text: The Council has determined it is prudent and in the best interests of the Pueblo and San Ildefonso Services, LLC to reorganize the Member's Representatives and the Management of San Ildefonso Services, LLC to allow for more efficient oversight and management of the entity.

recital.text: the Council has reviewed and approved the attached amended Articles of Organization and the Operating Agreement for San Ildefonso Services, LLC, effective as of March 31, 2018.

para.text: The Council has reviewed and approved the attached amended Articles of Organization and the Operating Agreement for San Ildefonso Services, LLC, effective as of March 31, 2018.

recital.text: that the Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council hereby approves and adopts this resolution in accordance with the requirements of the Agreement, according to published Council procedures, and authorizes and directs the Governor, or his designee, to take such actions as deemed necessary to carry out the intent of this resolution.

section.text: The Pueblo de San Ildefonso Council hereby approves and adopts this resolution in accordance with the requirements of the Agreement, according to published Council procedures, and authorizes and directs the Governor, or his designee, to take such actions as deemed necessary to carry out the intent of this resolution.

procedural-data.text: The foregoing resolution was duly voted upon by the Council on December 28, 2017, at a meeting with a vote of 8 in favor, 0 opposed, 0 abstaining, 1 vacancy, and 1 absent (Governor presiding and not voting) pursuant to the authority vested in the Council by the Agreement of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso.
COUNCIL REPRESENTATIVE SPONSOR(S): Council Representative M. Wayne Martinez
DELIVERY OF THE RESOLUTION TO THE GOVERNOR:

Resolution No. SI-R17-047 was presented to the Governor of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso on the 28th day of December, 2017, pursuant to the Governing document of the Pueblo de San Ildefonso ("Agreement"), GOVERNOR, Sec. 4 (c), and will become effective after signature by the Governor or veto override by the Council.
